name: Random Curiosity - Black ( randomc )
description:
Nice dark theme makes it easier on the eyes.  Links are blue everywhere except the right panel (hovering over a link will still be the lighter blue).  If you have ads on the site, install Adblock Plus and add a filter subscription.

Full-size "After" image:
http://sadpanda.us/images/204383-G8ZWVLJ.png
